net.sourceforge.jnipp.main
Class Main

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.main.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object

Entry point to invoke code generators. This class provides a main() method that accepts a project file name as parameter, attempts to open the file and, if successful, will invoke the code generators as specified therein.

Version:
$Revision: 1.13 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $

Constructor Detail

Main

public Main()
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Public entry point. This main() method will attempt to load the project file identified by the projectFile argument from the command line. It will delegate to the generate() method to coordinate the code generation.
Parameters:
args - The command-line argument vector.
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.Project), Project

generate

public static void generate(Project project)
                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            ProjectFormatException
Private method that coordinates code generation activities. This method is called by the main() method to invoke the code generations as specified by the project file that has been read in.
Parameters:
project - The Project instance containing the code generation settings.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException -  
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
main(java.lang.String[])
